junitx.framework
Class Assert

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--junit.framework.Assert
        |
        +--junitx.framework.Assert
public class Assert
extends junit.framework.Assert

A set of assert methods (primarly testing the negative assertion of the correspondent methods found in the junit.framework.Assert class).

Usage

    import junitx.framework.Assert;

    Assert.assertNotEquals(expected, actual);

Version:
$Revision: 1.13 $ $Date: 2003/03/21 06:13:49 $
Author:
Vladimir R. Bossicard

assertFalse

public static void assertFalse(java.lang.String message,
                               boolean condition)
Asserts that a condition is false. Throws a junitx.framework.ComparisonFailure if not.

assertNotEquals

public static void assertNotEquals(java.lang.String message,
                                   double expected,
                                   double actual,
                                   double delta)
Asserts that two doubles are not equal concerning a delta. If the expected value is infinity then the delta value is ignored. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are equal.
